ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror?  OY!
ygData.msgSnippet: Right it is a short stun whit a chance of mem wipe. ... From: Nat Russo  To:  Sent: Thursday, June 29,
ygData.messageBody:
Right it is a short stun whit a chance of mem wipe.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror? OY!


> Ahhhh ok. Think I get it now. I was expecting Terror to work more like
> Fear, but I had it totally wrong. So, if I have this correctly then, in
> the case of Ulrich McMannus: Using Screaming Terror basically just gives
> you a few seconds to get Darkness to stick?
>
> Mujahid.
>
> At 03:31 PM 6/29/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >ST is usually used to break up a spawn. Like to 2 sisters in the hut in
> >OOT. Cast ST on one the other follows. Usually if you get out of sight
the
> >second will not come after you and you can break the spawn.
> >
> >
> >Shadoewalker
> >lvl 45 Necro Brell
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
> >To: "EQ_Necromancers" <EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com>
> >Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 3:14 PM
> >Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror? OY!
> >
> >
> > > Hi guys/gals,
> > >
> > > A friend of mine (another necro) and I recently hit level 30. We
decided
> > > to pay good old Ulrich McMannus a visit in WK to try and get through
> >"Hell".
> > >
> > > The strategy on EQNecro makes use of our "Screaming Terror" spell, but
I
> > > just can't figure it out. When it actually sticks, it seems to stick
for
> > > no more than 2 seconds, tops. Am I doing something wrong?
> > >
> > > What we've been doing is opening with Darkness (dooming), then running
him
> > > back to our ambush point on the zone wall. Once there, we send the
pets
> >in
> > > and fear him. This strategy has worked well for us, as Screaming
Terror
> > > appears next to useless.
> > >
> > > Any thoughts or comments about Screaming Terror would be
> > > appreciated. Success stories? Failures? Advice?
> > >
> > > Thanks in advance,
> > > Mujahid, 30 Necro
> > >
> > >
> >
